interview_witnesses.title: The Web of Deception
interview_witnesses.description: The other aides reveal disturbing details: meetings held in secret locations, encrypted communications, and a network of operatives embedded in every major organization. But one aide remembers something crucial: 'Delegate Sage mentioned a name right before disappearing - someone called the Architect was supposed to meet them at the old Resonance Chamber. That was the last anyone saw of them.'

choices.text: 'I need to check that Resonance Chamber immediately!'
'First I need to see all the evidence they gathered.'
'This confirms the conspiracy - I need to coordinate the response.'
'Can we use emergency powers to act on this intelligence?'
